member.name: T:Sias.GripperFlexBcrYZ.SBarcodeReadPositionConfig
member.summary:
Barcode read position configuration
This class represents one barcode read setup. Depending on a specific barcode motor it defines the Read Offset, Barcode Orientation, Height Move Vector, and the barcode scan speed.

member.summary: Barcode read orientation field

member.summary: Barcode read offset field

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SBarcodeReadPositionConfig class.

member.summary: Position of the barcode Motor for this config property

member.name: P:Sias.GripperFlexBcrYZ.SBarcodeReadPositionConfig.BarcodeReadOffset
member.summary:
Barcode read offset property.
The barcode read offset defines the position where the barcode should be placed relatively to the Y/Z device reference position.

member.name: P:Sias.GripperFlexBcrYZ.SBarcodeReadPositionConfig.BarcodeReadOrientation
member.summary:
Barcode read orientation property.
The barcode orientation is read orientation if the Y/Z device is on orientation 0. It is a kind of orientation offset for the barcode reader. If the barcode reader Y/Z device has a rotation option the orientation can be adjusted to the orientation of the barcode.\n \b Important: To read a barcode with orientation 0 the barcode reader needs to be positioned to an orientation of 180Â°

member.name: P:Sias.GripperFlexBcrYZ.SBarcodeReadPositionConfig.HeightMoveVector
member.summary:
Barcode height move vector property.
This vector is used to calculate the barcode read movement. It is multiplied by the height of the barcode to define the barcode read move. 
 - ReadStart = BarcodeReadPosition - (BarcodeHeight/2)*HeightMoveVector 
 - ReadEnd = BarcodeReadPosition + (BarcodeHeight/2)*HeightMoveVector 
   Important: On rotation barcode devices X and Y are getting translated by the orientation.

member.name: P:Sias.GripperFlexBcrYZ.SBarcodeReadPositionConfig.BarcodeScanSpeed
member.summary: Barcode scan speed property

Barcode read position configuration collection
This collection defines a collection of barcode read position configurations.

member.name: T:Sias.GripperFlexBcrYZ.SGripperFlexBcrYZDevice
member.summary:
Gripper barcode Y/Z device class.
The gripper barcode Y/Z device is a gripper Y/Z device (\b see ) with an additional added barcode reader. In addition to the handling arm methods it supports barcode reading arm methods.
member.details:
\ingroup Dev_GripperFlexBcrYZ
The gripper barcode Y/Z device is derived from a gripper Y/Z device. In addition the gripper barcode Y/Z device implements the IBarcodeYZDevice interface with - a configuration property for the connected barcode reader; - a configuration property for the barcode read position; - a configuration property for the barcode height move vector; - a configuration property for the barcode read orientation and - a configuration property for the barcode read move speed. . As the device implements IBarcodeYZDevice it can be used with the barcode reading arm method class. So the AddArmMethods method adds a SBarcodeMethods class to the arms Arm method block list.
%SGripperFlexBcrYZDevice class diagram
\image html "SGripperFlexBcrYZDevice.png"

XML string configuration constructor.
This constructor creates a device by parsing the device parameters from the given XML configuration string.
Manual generation constructor. This constructor creates a device by using the requested parameters.
member.param: Barcode read offset (relative to Y/Z reference)

member.name: M:Sias.GripperFlexBcrYZ.SGripperFlexBcrYZDevice.GetErrorInfos
member.summary: This interface function returns the default error messages which can be generated by this device.

member.name: M:Sias.GripperFlexBcrYZ.SGripperFlexBcrYZDevice.Init(Sias.BaseDev.SDeviceInitOptions)
member.summary:
Init gripper Y/Z device.
This first calls the base initialization method initializing the Z, X and Y motor. Then it initializes the gripper and rotation motor.
member.remarks: The device gets locked/unlocked in this method. Timeout: BCReader.ActionLockTimeout

member.name: M:Sias.GripperFlexBcrYZ.SGripperFlexBcrYZDevice.SetReadMode(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Set Read mode
this methode sets a new read mode by moveing the defined barcode motor to the defined position and make the configuration set active.
member.param: New read mode index (index to ReadPositionConfig collection)

member.name: P:Sias.GripperFlexBcrYZ.SGripperFlexBcrYZDevice.BarcodeMotor
member.summary:
Barcode positioning motor property
This motor is used to change the barcode read position. It is possible to have a shared motor (same address as for another axis) for this.
